meanings.definition: A place where clothes are washed using coin-operated machines.
meanings.sent1: I went to the washateria to clean my clothes.
meanings.sent2: My mom always takes our dirty laundry to the washateria.
meanings.sent3: The washateria was so busy that I had to wait for a machine.
meanings.sent4: The washateria hummed with the sound of spinning machines.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of the washateria made it feel like daytime even at night.

meanings.definition: The act of washing clothes at a laundromat.
meanings.sent1: Doing laundry at the washateria saves time.
meanings.sent2: I find the washateria convenient for cleaning my clothes.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped my sock on the floor at the washateria.
meanings.sent4: The rhythm of washing machines at the washateria was like a song.
meanings.sent5: The smell of detergent filled the air at the washateria.
